meanings: (확실한 건 아니지만) by any chance, (just) in case
because no one knows what may or may not happen, just in case
if you happen to come this way

vlive.korean: 혹시 - 혹시? Perhaps... - Perhaps? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] DREAMCATCHER X Rooftop Live - 드림캐쳐의 루프탑라이브!

vlive.english: Is that him? By any chance?

모아 나 좋아하나 혹시? MOA, do you like me? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 연준이와 소통먹방
